name: claude-self-learning (ychampion)
description: [项目级]  A Claude Code self learning plugin that autonomously researches any technology and generates reusable SKILL.md files with installation guides, code examples, and best practices. 。来源: https://github.com/ychampion/claude-self-learning

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A Claude Code self learning plugin that autonomously researches any technology and generates reusable SKILL.md files with installation guides, code examples, and best practices. 

来源: https://github.com/ychampion/claude-self-learning
语言: unknown
Stars: 3

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
README.md
agents
agents/researcher.md
agents/skill-generator.md
commands
commands/learn.md
commands/list-skills.md
commands/update-skill.md
skills
skills/self-learning
storage
storage/.gitkeep
storage/skills

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
```markdown
---
name: anthropic-api
description: Complete guide to using the Anthropic Claude API
version: 1.0.0
sources_verified: 2026-02-07
---

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Multi-source verification** - Cross-checks facts across authoritative sources
- **Interactive learning** - Asks clarifying questions for broad topics
- **Skill versioning** - Tracks updates with .meta.json metadata
- **Production-ready output** - Error handling, best practices, real examples

---

name: claude-self-learning/agents 模块
description: [模块级] claude-self-learning 项目的 agents 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/ychampion/claude-self-learning

genes.title: agents 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: agents/
类型: source
文件数: 2

包含文件:
- agents/researcher.md
- agents/skill-generator.md

name: claude-self-learning/commands 模块
description: [模块级] claude-self-learning 项目的 commands 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/ychampion/claude-self-learning

genes.title: commands 模块说明
genes.content:
| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/learn <topic>` | Research a topic and generate a skill |
| `/update-skill <topic>` | Refresh an existing skill with latest info |
| `/list-skills` | View all generated skills |

---

name: claude-self-learning/skills 模块
description: [模块级] claude-self-learning 项目的 skills 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/ychampion/claude-self-learning

genes.title: skills 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: skills/
类型: source
文件数: 5

包含文件:
- skills/self-learning
- skills/self-learning/SKILL.md
- skills/self-learning/references
- skills/self-learning/references/best_practices.md
- skills/self-learning/references/skill_template.md

name: claude-self-learning/storage 模块
description: [模块级] claude-self-learning 项目的 storage 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/ychampion/claude-self-learning

genes.title: storage 模块说明
genes.content:
| Location | Path | Use Case |
|----------|------|----------|
| Project-local | `./.claude/skills/<topic>/` | Project-specific |
| User-global | `~/.claude/skills/<topic>/` | All projects |
| Plugin storage | `./storage/skills/<topic>/` | Git-tracked |

---
